originalText.text: The business was very clean and smell great, it’s instantly relaxing when you walk inside. Helena was an amazing , professional, knowledgeable and friendly esthetician. We def recommend this place for all your post plastic surgery massage.

text.text: The business was very clean and smell great, it’s instantly relaxing when you walk inside. Helena was an amazing , professional, knowledgeable and friendly esthetician. We def recommend this place for all your post plastic surgery massage.

originalText.text: Hands down the best massage place you can ever visit. Alleina is amazing she’s so knowledgeable and she listens to you!!! When I came here I was taking one step at time to walk after two sessions I was walking like if I hadn’t had surgery 2 weeks prior!! I would recommend a millions times. There’s no where else I’d rather go! I come from New Jersey just to see her!!! Y’all she got my body on 10!!!!

originalText.text:
Best Postop therapist in NYC !
Alleina is so amazing at what she does, she truly has a gift ! If you want the maximum results of your surgical procedure then you’ve come to the right place for post operative care. Even my bruising has gone down just after 1 session.

The environment is truly ethereal, very private & cozy (perfect for celebrity clientele) . It smells amazing I’m here & the music is always nice ! Alleina cares for her clients  & goes above & beyond to make sure you get the best results of your investment. She’s very knowledgeable & has an answer for everything ! So glad I found her for my second round of surgery, I wish I had her for my round 1 instead of the overhyped place I went to with thousands of followers & mediocre service (don’t waist your money on those places) the best is RIGHT HERE !

originalText.text: I had a procedure done last week and I am so incredibly thankful that I came across Ethereal Touch Body Studio. Alleina is so knowledgeable about post op care, she is a registered nurse, knows her stuff and is a sweetheart. She takes her time explaining everything and answering all of your questions. I went to see her the day after my procedure and from that very first visit I knew that she would be the one taking care of all of my post op massages. I had a concern about inflammation on my back during one of my visits and she introduced me to Kinesio taping. She put these strips of tapes on my back and positioned them in a way that wouldn’t allow fluid build up and after 5 days I couldn’t believe what I saw. My back looks so good. Her whole demeanor is so positive and caring. You can tell that she genuinely loves what she does and cares about her clients. She is stuck with me now because nobody else will ever touch me when it comes post-op care.

originalText.text: I can not recommend Alleina at Ethereal touch more. She is a Gem. She came highly recommended by my surgeon's office. And I feel so lucky to have cross paths with her. She is a highly skilled and knowledgeable RN. I have had post op care before. But she is hands down the best in NYC. She over teaches, genuinely cares, & stays on top on her clients to make sure that they stay on track. Other places wanted to use machines on me too soon. Alleina used her hands & homeopathic techniques for almost 6 weeks before offering cavitation and radio frequency. Which she taught me could ruin your results if used too soon.  compared to the other places I've looked into she is super affordable!!  If you're having any kind of surgery.Cosmetic or medically needed. Book her!!
